## æµ‹è¯•test.pyæ–‡ä»¶
æºç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªåŠ¨é‡å¤ä½ å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯çš„æœºå™¨äººï¼Œåªéœ€å°†ç¬¬67è¡Œçš„tokenæ”¹ä¸ºä½ çš„æœºå™¨äººtokenå³å¯
{% note info no-icon telegrambot.py %} {% code %}
#!/usr/bin/env python
# pylint: disable=unused-argument, wrong-import-position
# This program is dedicated to the public domainunder the CC0 license.
""" Simple Bot to reply to Telegram messages.
First, a few handler functions are defined. Then, those functions are passed to the Application and registered at their respective places. Then, the bot is started and runs until we press Ctrl-C on the command line.
Usage: Basic Echobot example, repeats messages. Press Ctrl-C on the command line or send a signal to the process to stop the bot. """
import logging
from telegram import __version__ as TG_VER
try: from telegram import __version_info__ except ImportError: __version_info__ = (0, 0, 0, 0, 0) # type: ignore[assignment]
if __version_info__ < (20, 0, 0, "alpha", 1): raise RuntimeError( f"This example is not compatible with your current PTB version {TG_VER}. To view the " f"{TG_VER} version of this example, " f"visit https://docs.python-telegram-bot.org/en/v{TG_VER}/examples.html" ) from telegram import ForceReply, Update from telegram.ext import Application, CommandHandler, ContextTypes, MessageHandler, filters
# Enable logging
logging.basicConfig( format="%(asctime)s - %(name)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s", level=logging.INFO ) logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
# Define a few command handlers. These usually take the two arguments update and
# context.
async def start(update: Update, context: ContextTypes.DEFAULT_TYPE) -> None: """Send a message when the command /start is issued.""" user = update.effective_user await update.message.reply_html( rf"Hi {user.mention_html()}!", reply_markup=ForceReply(selective=True), )
async def help_command(update: Update, context: ContextTypes.DEFAULT_TYPE) -> None: """Send a message when the command /help is issued.""" await update.message.reply_text("Help!")
async def echo(update: Update, context: ContextTypes.DEFAULT_TYPE) -> None: """Echo the user message.""" await update.message.reply_text(update.message.text)
def main() -> None: """Start the bot.""" # Create the Application and pass it your bot's token. â€‹ TOKEN = 'your token' â€‹ proxy_url = 'http://127.0.0.1:7890' â€‹ application = Application.builder().token(TOKEN).proxy_url(proxy_url).build()
# on different commands - answer in Telegram â€‹ application.add_handler(CommandHandler("start", start)) â€‹ application.add_handler(CommandHandler("help", help_command)) â€‹ â€‹ # on non command i.e message - echo the message on Telegram â€‹ application.add_handler(MessageHandler(filters.TEXT & ~filters.COMMAND, echo)) â€‹ â€‹ # Run the bot until the user presses Ctrl-C â€‹ application.run_polling()
if __name__ == "__main__": main()
{% endcode %} {% endnote %}

# 2-Sum Protocol
## åè®®å†…å®¹
å‡è®¾å†ä¸€æ¬¡é€šä¿¡ä¸­æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªäººï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ä¸ºAliceï¼ŒBobå’ŒCarolã€‚å…¶ä¸­ï¼ŒAliceå’ŒBobä¸ºå‘é€æ–¹ï¼ŒCarolä¸ºæ¥æ”¶æ–¹ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ¥æ”¶Aliceå’ŒBobæ•°æ®çš„æ¨¡å’Œã€‚Aliceå’ŒBobå„è‡ªæ‹¥æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªqubits$\mathcal{A}_1$å’Œ$\mathcal{A}2$ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸¤ä¸ªé‡å­æ¯”ç‰¹çš„è”åˆæ€å¤„äºæœ€å¤§çº ç¼ æ€$|\Phi\rangle:=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}\sum_{i=0}^{1}|i\rangle\otimes|i\rangle$ã€‚é‚£ä¹ˆ2-sum protocolç”±ä¸‹é¢æ­¥éª¤ç»™å‡ºï¼š
æ­¥éª¤1ï¼šAliceå’ŒBobåˆ†åˆ«å¯¹$\mathcal{A}_1$*å’Œ*$\mathcal{A}2$è¿›è¡Œ$W(a,b)$å’Œ$W(c,d)$æ“ä½œã€‚å…¶ä¸­$a,b,c,d\in\mathbb{Z}_2$ï¼Œ$W(a,b)=\mathsf{X}^a\mathsf{Z}^b$ã€‚
$\mathsf{X},\mathsf{Z}$åˆ†åˆ«å¯¹åº”Pauliæ“ä½œ $$ \mathsf{X}:=\sum_{i=0}^1|i+1\rangle\langle i|,\mathsf{Z}:=\sum_{i=0}^1(-1)^i|i\rangle\langle i|. $$ æ­¥éª¤2ï¼šAliceå’ŒBobåˆ†åˆ«å°†qubitså’Œå‘é€ç»™Carol
æ­¥éª¤3ï¼šCarolå¯¹æ¥æ”¶åˆ°çš„é‡å­ç³»ç»Ÿè¿›è¡ŒPVM $\mathbf{M}_{\mathbb{Z}^2_\mathcal{l}}$æµ‹é‡å¹¶å¾—åˆ°æµ‹é‡ç»“æœ$(e,f)$ã€‚
æµ‹é‡æ“ä½œ$\mathbf{M}_{\mathbb{Z}^2_2}$ä¸º $$ \begin{equation}\mathbf{M}_{\mathbb{Z}_2^2}:=\{M_{(a,b)}\mid a,b\in\mathbb{Z}_2\},\ \ \text{where}\ \ M_{(a,b)}:=(\mathsf{I}\otimes\mathsf{W}(a,b))|\Phi\rangle\langle\Phi|(\mathsf{I}\otimes\mathsf{W}(a,b)^\dagger). \label{1} \end{equation} $$ å› ä¸ºåœ¨å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªé‡å­æ¯”ç‰¹ä¸Šçš„æ“ä½œå¯ä»¥è½¬åŒ–åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªé‡å­æ¯”ç‰¹ä¸Šï¼Œå³ $$ \begin{aligned} (\mathsf{I}\otimes\mathsf{W}(a,b))|\Phi\rangle & =\left(\mathsf{W}(a,b)^{\top}\otimes\mathsf{I}\right)|\Phi\rangle \\ &=\left(\mathsf{W}(a,b)^\dagger\otimes\mathsf{I}\right)|\Phi\rangle \\ &=(-1)^{ab}(\mathsf{W}(a,b)\otimes\mathsf{I})|\Phi\rangle. \end{aligned} $$ åˆå› ä¸ºå¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªé‡å­æ¯”ç‰¹è¿›è¡Œä¸¤æ¬¡W(a,b)æ“ä½œæ»¡è¶³å¦‚ä¸‹ç­‰å¼ $$ \mathsf W(a_1,b_1)\mathsf W(a_2,b_2)=(-1)^{b_1a_2}\mathsf W(a_1+a_2,b_1+b_2). $$ å› æ­¤ï¼ŒAliceå’ŒBobåˆ†åˆ«å¯¹$\mathcal{A}_1$*å’Œ*$\mathcal{A}2$è¿›è¡Œ$W(a,b)$å’Œ$W(c,d)$æ“ä½œï¼Œç­‰ä»·äºAliceå¯¹$\mathcal{A}_1$åˆ†åˆ«è¿›è¡Œäº†W(a,b)å’Œ$(-1)^{cd}W(c,d)$æ“ä½œï¼Œå³ $$ (-1)^{cd}W(a,b)W(c,d)=(-1)^{bd}W(a+c,b+d). $$ è¿™é‡Œçš„$(-1)^{bd}W(a+c,b+d)$å¯ä»¥çœ‹æˆæ˜¯$W(a+c,b+d)$æ“ä½œï¼Œæ­£è´Ÿå¯ä»¥ç†è§£ä¸ºåªæ˜¯ç›¸ä½ä¸åŒï¼Œå¯¹ç»“æœä¸ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿå½±å“ã€‚ä»å¼$\eqref{1}$ä¸­ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªç¬¦å·ä¼šæŠµæ¶ˆæ‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥$(e,f)$å°±æ˜¯$(a+c,b+d)$ï¼Œæ•´ä¸ªä¼ è¾“è¿‡ç¨‹ä»…éœ€è¦ä¸¤ä¸ªqubitsã€‚
å…·ä½“è¿‡ç¨‹å¦‚å›¾1æ‰€ç¤º
![image-20230716162707545](https://github.com/maihm6/CSDN/blob/main/image-20230716162707545.png)
## ä¸¾ä¾‹åˆ†æ
å‡è®¾Aliceè¦å‘é€çš„ä¿¡æ¯ä¸º$(a,b)=(0,1)$ï¼ŒBobéœ€è¦å‘é€çš„æ•°æ®ä¸º$(c,d)=(1,1)$ï¼Œé‡å­ç³»ç»Ÿçš„åˆå§‹çŠ¶æ€ä¸º$|\varphi\rangle=|\Phi\rangle=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(|00\rangle+|11\rangle)$ã€‚
Pauliæ“ä½œä¸­çš„Xæ“ä½œå®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯å°†$|0\rangle$å’Œ$|1\rangle$ä½ç½®äº’æ¢ï¼ŒZæ“ä½œåˆ™æ˜¯å°†$|1\rangle$çš„ç›¸ä½ç¿»è½¬ã€‚æ“ä½œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸ºï¼š
1. Aliceè¿›è¡Œ$W(a,b)$æ“ä½œåï¼Œç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸º$|\varphi\rangle=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(|00\rangle-|11\rangle)$ã€‚ 2. Bobè¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œåï¼Œç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸º$|\varphi\rangle=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(|01\rangle+|10\rangle)$ã€‚
ç»è¿‡Aliceå’ŒBobçš„æ“ä½œåï¼Œç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸º$|\varphi\rangle=-\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}}(|01\rangle+|10\rangle)$ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç»“æœä¸åªæœ‰Aliceè¿›è¡Œ$(-1)^{bd}W(a+c,b+d)=-W(1,0)$æ“ä½œæ˜¯ä¸€è‡´çš„ã€‚Carolå¯¹æ¥æ”¶åˆ°çš„é‡å­ç³»ç»Ÿè¿›è¡Œæµ‹é‡åå¾—åˆ°ç»“æœä¸º$(e,f)=(1,0)=(a+c,b+d)$ã€‚å› æ­¤ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­åªç”¨äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªqubitså°±å°†(a+c,b+d)ç»™å‘é€å‡ºå»ã€‚
## æ€»ç»“
2-sum protocolåˆ©ç”¨äº†é‡å­ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„é‡å­çº ç¼ è¿™ä¸€ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå°†åŸå…ˆä¼ ç»Ÿé€šä¿¡ä¸­éœ€è¦4bitsæ‰èƒ½ä¼ è¾“çš„å†…å®¹ç”¨ä¸¤ä¸ªqubitså°±èƒ½ä¼ è¾“å®Œã€‚è¿™åœ¨æ±‚å’Œé€šä¿¡ç½‘ç»œä¸­å°†æé«˜é€šä¿¡æ•ˆç‡ï¼Œæå‡ç½‘ç»œæ€§èƒ½ï¼Œå¯¹ç ”ç©¶æ›´åŠ å¤æ‚çš„$\sum-QMAC$å…·æœ‰é‡è¦æ„ä¹‰ã€‚
